subject: Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Dennis Erickson, the running backs coach for No. 10 Utah, won two titles at Miami; is the only person named Pac-10 coach of the year at three universities; and he led two N.F.L. teams.
snippet: Dennis Erickson, the running backs coach for No. 10 Utah, won two titles at Miami; is the only person named Pac-10 coach of the year at three universities; and he led two N.F.L. teams.
